item.brutality.bomb_seal.passive.1: §e -Attach it onto an Item using an anvil to make it Explosive
brutality.bomb_seal.armor: §8 -Throws out a Bomb Flower every time you take Damage, stackable
brutality.bomb_seal.item: §8 -Throws out a Bomb Flower every time you Melee an enemy
brutality.bomb_seal.projectile: §8 -Throws out a Bomb Flower every the Projectile collides
item.brutality.cosmic_seal.passive.1: §e -Attach it onto an Item using an anvil to make it Starry
brutality.cosmic_seal.armor: §8 -Rains down a Star at the Attacker every time you take Damage, stackable
brutality.cosmic_seal.item: §8 -Rains down a Star every time you Melee an enemy
brutality.cosmic_seal.projectile: §8 -Rains down a Star every time the Projectile collides
block.brutality.filing_cabinet.descripti: §e -Can only store Books and similar items
spell.brutality.void_walk.description.1: §8Blink instantly to a targeted location within range
spell.brutality.spatial_rupture.descript: §8Conjure a ripple in space, knocking back nearby mobs and damaging them
spell.brutality.gravitic_implosion.descr: §8Throw a collapsing singularity that draws in nearby mobs and deals AoE damage
spell.brutality.dematerialize.descriptio: §8Deletes the targeted mob, only if their§r ❤§9 Health§e is below the threshold (Deletes all drops)
spell.brutality.edge_of_oblivion.descrip: §8Materialize a disc of antimatter, and launches it forward, shredding through mobs
§8Grants §eGrace§8, nullifying the next instance of damage you take, scales with level
spell.brutality.sacrifice.description.1: §aHeals§8 nearby players, including the caster, healing is distributed evenly and any excess is transferred to the next lowest player. Prioritizes the caster
§8Materialize a disc of antimatter, and launches it forward, shredding through mobs
spell.brutality.divine_retribution.descr: §8Call down God's judgement at the targeted location
spell.brutality.light_binding.descriptio: §8Bind the target in shackles of light, halting their movement
spell.brutality.cosmic_cataclysm.descrip: §8Call down a massive meteor, causing a shockwave on impact
spell.brutality.meteor_shower.descriptio: §8Calls down a continuous barrage of meteors at the target location
spell.brutality.gravitokinesis.descripti: §8Pulls targeted mobs towards the caster, can be inverted by crouching, knocking mobs away while pushing back the player
§8Unleashes a continuous barrage of stars at the targeted location
spell.brutality.star_burst.description.1: §8Unleashes a burst of stars at the targeted direction
spell.brutality.singularity_shift.descri: §8Throw a star that spawns a field of augmented gravity upon impact. Gravity direction can be changed by shifting
spell.brutality.annihilation.description: §8Summon lances in a star around the caster. Lances apply §cHexed§8 and have a chance to explode on contact
spell.brutality.stygian_step.description: §8Dash forward, damaging mobs at the end of the dash
spell.brutality.chthonic_capsule.descrip: §8Throw out a blood clot that explodes some time after hitting the ground. Explodes prematurely when hitting an enemy
spell.brutality.brimspike.description.1: §8Conjure a Brimspike that spins rapidly and can be shot out, damage dealt is based on time charged
spell.brutality.brimspike.fail: §cOnly one Brimspike can be present at a time
spell.brutality.nightfall.description.1: §8Temporarily makes it midnight, nearby mobs are inflicted with §7Slowness§8 and§8 Blindness
spell.brutality.moonlit_mending.descript: §8§aHeals§8 the caster depending on the time of day (Noon = 10% Max§r ❤§9 Health§e | Midnight 100% Max§r ❤§9 Health§e) excess healing is converted into absorption level
